description: President Trump condemned hate groups, including white supremacists, two days after a car drove into a crowd of people in the midst of violent clashes over a white nationalist rally in Charlottesville, Virginia.
maintext: President Donald Trump named and condemned "repugnant" hate groups and declared that "racism is evil" in a far more forceful statement than he'd made earlier after deadly, race-fueled clashes in Charlottesville, Virginia over the weekend.for more stories, photos, and video on President Donald Trump.
title: VIDEO: President Trump condemns hate groups after violent Virginia rally
